File Metacommunity.h¶

Generates a neutral metacommunity.

Contents

  • Definition (necsim/Metacommunity.h)
  • Detailed Description
  • Includes
  • Included By
  • Classes

Definition (necsim/Metacommunity.h)¶

  • Program Listing for File Metacommunity.h

Detailed Description¶

Generates a metacommunity using spatially-implicit neutral simulations, which is used to draw individuals from a community. Samuel Thompson MIT Licence. Individuals will be drawn from the metacommunity for each speciation event, instead of creating a new species each time. The metacommunity itself is generated using spatially-implicit neutral simulations. Contact: samuel.thompson14@imperial.ac.uk or thompsonsed@gmail.com
